content:
Meeting day! :tada:

@T-libs our agenda is completely empty today. no regressions, no backports, no critical issues. :confetti:

@T-libs-api, meeting at 2021-10-06T21:00:00+02:00, agenda: https://hackmd.io/EAX5En4fRi23eAYS61a1UQ

@T-libs for next week, i think it'd be interesting to talk about the different parts of the standard library implementation and discuss the state of them, and figure out which parts could use implementation improvements. (e.g. all the different platforms we support, data structures, synchronization primitives, file system support, etc.)
but it'd be good to prepare something for that, so let's do that next week.
Sounds good. I think we're overdue a discussion on improving mutexes/parking_lot integration.
I presume the t-libs meeting is canceled? We're only having t-libs-api?
@Mara can we make sure that https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/88967 reaches a decision today? we should get moving on the revert or whatever we end up with quickly, given closeness of release
yes! it's on the agenda, and i have a note here to prioritize it
I am on vacation this week with a weird schedule and can't make the libs-api meeting this week

### Stalled Tracking Issues

- [30 `rust-lang/rust` `T-libs-api` `C-tracking-issue` items](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=label:T-libs-api+label:C-tracking-issue+is:open+sort:updated-asc)
  - [[64888](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/64888)] *Tracking issue for \`report\-time\`*
  - [[74217](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/74217)] *Tracking Issue for deque\_range*
  - [[71582](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/71582)] *Tracking Issue for Box::into\_boxed\_slice*
  - [[71213](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/71213)] *Tracking Issue for \`wasi\_ext\`*
  - [[69099](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/69099)] *Tracking Issue for \`std::cell::{Ref, RefMut}::leak\`*
_spins fingerguns and puts them in pockets_
